Joel__01.1: The word of the Lord that came to Joel the son of Phatuel.
Joel__01.2: Hear this, ye old men, and give ear, all ye inhabitants of the land: did this ever happen in your days, or in the days of your fathers?
Joel__01.3: Tell ye of this to your children, and let your children tell their children, and their children to another generation.
Joel__01.4:
<u>
              That which the palmerworm hath left
             </u>, the locust hath eaten: and that which the locust hath left, the bruchus hath eaten: and that which the bruchus hath left, the mildew hath destroyed.
Joel__01.5: Awake, ye that are drunk, and weep, and mourn all ye that take delight in drinking sweet wine: for it is cut off from your mouth.
Joel__01.6: For a nation is come up upon my land, strong and without number: his teeth are like the teeth of a lion: and his cheek teeth as of a lion's whelp.
Joel__01.7: He hath laid my vineyard waste, and hath pilled off the bark of my fig tree: he hath stripped it bare, and cast it away; the branches thereof are made white.
Joel__01.8: Lament like a virgin girded with sackcloth for the husband of her youth.
Joel__01.9: Sacrifice and libation is cut off from the house of the Lord: the priests, the Lord's ministers, have mourned:
Joel__01.10: The country is destroyed, the ground hath mourned: for the corn is wasted, the wine is confounded, the oil hath languished.
Joel__01.11: The husbandmen are ashamed, the vinedressers have howled for the wheat, and for the barley, because the harvest of the field is perished.
Joel__01.12: The vineyard is confounded, and the fig tree hath languished: the pomegranate tree, and the palm tree, and the apple tree, and all the trees of the field are withered: because joy is withdrawn from the children of men.
Joel__01.13: Gird yourselves, and lament, O ye priests, howl, ye ministers of the altars: go in, lie in sackcloth, ye ministers of my God: because sacrifice and libation is cut off from the house of your God.
Joel__01.14: Sanctify ye a fast, call an assembly; gather together the ancients, all the inhabitants of the land into the house of your God: and cry ye to the Lord:
Joel__01.15: Ah, ah, ah, for the day: because the day of the Lord is at hand, and it shall come like destruction from the mighty.
Joel__01.16: Is not your food cut off before your eyes, joy and gladness from the house of our God?
Joel__01.17: The beasts have rotted in their dung, the barns are destroyed, the storehouses are broken down: because the corn is confounded.
Joel__01.18: Why did the beast groan, why did the herds of cattle low? because there is no pasture for them: yea, and the flocks of sheep are perished.
Joel__01.19: To thee, O Lord, will I cry: because fire hath devoured the beautiful places of the wilderness, and the flame hath burnt all the trees of the country.
Joel__01.20: Yea and the beasts of the field have looked up to thee, as a garden bed that thirsteth after rain, for the springs of waters are dried up, and fire hath devoured the beautiful places of the wilderness.
